GreasySpoon

Packages
icap Overall ICAP package.
icap.core Core ICAP processing features: statics, protocol parser and abstraction layer for fast services development
icap.services ICAP Services implementation.
icap.services.resources.gs icap services specific resources
org.json JSON conversion library, coming from json official site
tools.general General tools classes and methods for content manipulation / optimization
tools.httpserver Basic HTTP / HTTPS server for Server administration.
Attention: this server is used for convenience in order to avoid the need of installing/configuring external server.
No security audit nor intrusion tests have been performed on it.
tools.httpserver.custom Specific pages adaptation for GreasySpoon administration
tools.logger Log management factories.
tools.logger.syslog Syslog facilities - allows to send message to local/distant syslog server.
tools.monitor Implements server/traffic statistics collection and charts generation
tools.sec Encryption libraries.
